metrics_conclusion: Exile Vilify has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: Exile Vilify has sections analyzed in the following keys: D♯ Minor,  and F♯ Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!

metadata.editComments: changed the fourth and eight chords on the last line to F#. they were previously C#add4.
